channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Far-right parties lead opinion polls in Europe's four largest economies
item.description: Vice President J.D. Vance , Elon Musk and other MAGA voices horrified Europe's leaders by embracing Germany's AfD and other far-right parties early in...

item.title: New visas paused for commercial truck drivers, Rubio says
item.description: The federal government will pause issuing new visas for commercial truck drivers , Secretary of State Marco Rubio said Thursday night. Why it matters:...

item.title: FBI raids former National Security Adviser John Bolton's home: Reports
item.description: The FBI raided the Maryland home of John Bolton , President Trump 's former national security adviser, on Friday morning, multiple outlets reported . ...

item.title: Famine in Gaza confirmed by hunger monitor for first time since war started
item.description: Portions of Gaza are enduring famine , a UN-backed hunger monitor said Friday in a determination Israel rejected as fabricated and political. Why it m...

item.title: Trump thanks officers and National Guard troops in D.C. stop
item.description: President Donald Trump visited law enforcement officers in D.C. as the administration continued its efforts to exert control over the city.

item.title: With grieving parents watching, Texas lawmakers pass camp safety bill
item.description: The measure was the first to clear the legislature as it responds to the catastrophic flooding that killed 25 young campers and 112 others last month.

item.title: Texas state Senate closes in on passing Trump-backed election map
item.description: The GOP-controlled chamber will be back in session Friday, looking to create five new U.S. House districts in Texas that favor Republicans. The plan h...

item.title: House expected to get first batch of Epstein files from Justice Department

item.title: Democrats are pushing back against crackdown on sanctuary cities
item.description: Some responded with strongly worded letters. Others spoke out publicly, accusing Attorney General Pam Bondi of trying to unlawfully bully governors an...

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
